nodes.text: The Ottega sector was a sector located in the Mid Rim. Planets in the sector included Arthon, Ithor, Orocco, Toskhowwl VI, and Vessitoar. The sector included at least a part of the Lesser Plooriod Cluster. It had 75 planets and 622 moons.
Following the Battle of Endor, the Ottega sector was among the first sectors to throw off the Empire.
At different times, Ottega sector was represented in the Galactic Senate by Oraltor and Tendau Bendon and in the New Republic Senate by Umwaw Moolis.
